root.name: Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show
root.description: Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show is a collection of six mini games set in the Wild West. Game 1: In this game you have to throw knives at a spinning board and hopefully miss the young lady who is strapped to it.Game 2: This mini game is reminiscent of Operation Wolf and Cabal. You have to shoot the enemy targets but not shoot the friendly targets. During the second section of this mini game you have to shoot the bottles being thrown at you.Game 3: In the third game you have to prove your cowboy skills by roping a cattle within the time limit.Game 4: Bronco riding is a necessary skill for any cowboy and that's exactly what the fourth game is.Game 5: In the fifth game you have to wrestle a steer. Jump on the steer and start your joystick waggling.Game 6: The last game is all about catching and jumping on to a moving stagecoach to stop the hijacker.
